India opens new naval base near Maldives amid tense ties and with eye on BeijingIndia on Wednesday opened a new naval base on its Indian Ocean island close to the Maldives, as ties with Male remain tense and New Delhi jostles anew with China for influence in the region. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:23:39 GMT WJJTTU2FM5JFXGR2AFPUZ2D7K4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-opens-new-naval-base-near-maldives-amid-tense-ties-with-eye-beijing-2024-03-06/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
US urges allies to tighten China's access to chip technology, Bloomberg reportsThe U.S. government is urging the Netherlands, Germany, South Korea and Japan to further tighten curbs on China's access to semiconductor technology, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:19:29 GMT PN4E2RLXYFOZRCWHJOMJBA2CWM https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-urges-allies-tighten-chinas-access-chip-technology-bloomberg-reports-2024-03-06/Reuters技术
U.S. Senate committee approves bill that could restrict Chinese biotechThe U.S. Senate's homeland security committee voted on Wednesday to move forward a bill that could restrict business with Chinese biotech companies like BGI and WuXi Apptec on national security grounds. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:03:57 GMT YOQIYPCCP5KULHL6XUKNCEXPIE https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-senate-committee-approves-bill-that-c​​ould-restrict-chinese-biotech-2024-03-06/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Antfin sells about 2% stake in India's Zomato via bulk dealsChina's Antfin has sold a 2.1% stake in Indian food delivery platform Zomato via bulk deals on Wednesday, stock exchange data showed. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 14:36:14 GMT PBSS2IO7ZBPQPEU6QAHCYSQZUE https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/antfin-sells-about-2-stake-indias-zomato-via-bulk-deals-2024-03-06/Reuters市场交易
'No serious mass political incidents' in Tibet last year, says senior officialA senior Tibet official on Wednesday said there were no "mass incidents" last year in the Himalayan region, a euphemism for protests, at a briefing on the sidelines of China's annual parliamentary sessions. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 13:12:06 GMT 6S7ASKQAAZP6FF5FMGGWLWGI5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/no-serious-mass-political-incidents-tibet-last-year-says-senior-official-2024-03-06/Laurie Chen世界亚太地区
China gives green light to Stellantis-Leapmotor joint venture - sourcesA proposed joint venture that would allow world No. 4 automaker Stellantis to build and sell Leapmotor's electric vehicles outside China has received approval from a Chinese regulator, according to two sources familiar with the matter. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 13:07:08 GMT V5ELPEL64FO2DHK53VO7OUHMVY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/china-gives-green-light-stellantis-leapmotor-joint-venture-sources-2024-03-06/Gilles Guillaume商业汽车与交通
